# C  {#sec-C.unnumbered}


In this part of the book we will look at the geoms starts with letter "c" or "C".



```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(kableExtra)
geomc <- c('geom_col',
          'geom_col_pattern', 'geom_circle')
sectionc <- c(5.1, 5.2, 5.3)
dfc <- data.frame(geom = geomc,
                  section = sectionc)
dfc |> knitr::kable(format = "html") |> kable_styling(full_width = F)
```
